ibm-appid-user-roles:
ibm_appid_user_roles

Create, update, or delete an IBM Cloud AppID Management Services user roles resource. For more information, see assigning roles to users with the API
example-usage:
Example usage

terraformresource "ibm_appid_user_roles" "roles" { tenant_id = var.tenant_id subject = ibm_appid_cloud_directory_user.test_user.subject role_ids = [ibm_appid_role.test_role.role_id]}
argument-reference:
Argument reference

Review the argument references that you can specify for your resource.

  • tenant_id - (Required, String) The AppID instance GUID
  • subject - (Required, String) The user's identifier ('subject' in identity token)
  • role_ids - (Required, List of String) The list of AppID role ids that you would like to assign to the user
import:
Import

The ibm_appid_user_roles resource can be imported by using the AppID tenant ID and user subject string.

Syntax

bash$ terraform import ibm_appid_user_roles.roles <tenant_id>/<subject>
Example

bash$ terraform import ibm_appid_user_roles.roles 5fa344a8-d361-4bc2-9051-58ca253f4b2b/03cd638a-b35a-43f2-a58a-c2d3fe26aaea
description:
ibm_appid_user_roles

Create, update, or delete an IBM Cloud AppID Management Services user roles resource. For more information, see assigning roles to users with the API
